Reviews.Title: “brilliant location”

Reviews.Content: stayed superbreaks package found ideal bedroom expecting reading reviews found clean pleasant looking frills rest head busy day london definalty recommend

Reviews.Title: “Good location but very tiny”
Reviews.Author: persejonh
Reviews.Content: hotel located earls court near pubs shops walk tube 5 minutes live friend meet headon time paid price 50 pounds night option price

Reviews.Title: “Tiny rooms, uncomfortable beds, but good location”
Reviews.Author: ww-wef
Reviews.Content: dont space hotel ridiculous cramped wasnt lie suitcase tv fuzzy couldnt watch bed pillows hard lumpy shower slow dribbled radiator window middle winter unbearably stuffy impossible sleep finally leave suitcases day didnt carry round pay privilege advantages hotel location fantastic lobby beautiful time sleep dont wed especially normal advertised rates special offer

Reviews.Title: “Good location - hotel could be better”
Reviews.Author: tomanem
Reviews.Content: booked based price location rate rest heads night catching flight heathrow location wise spot 5 min walk earls court tube station picadilly line kings cross hotel day straight heathrow walls thin loud oriental family door kept awake til hours swift bang wall stopped bit street noise front hotel decor bit rubbish bed hard biggest bathroom world didnt equipped clean rest freshen night recommend night nice restaurants pubs round corner stops covent garden leicester square price alright

Reviews.Title: “Requires a complete overhall to the rooms”
Reviews.Author: Steven N
Reviews.Content: cheap hotel price quality hotels impressions reception looking dining ultra modern looks lead false hope shattered moment enter lift 4th floor arrive lift floor door faced corridor step darkness sensor pick lights am saving power hotel corridors dingy creaky hotel creaky upgraded family found single bed foot ground double bed tiny amount bedding clean hotel bed covers faded didnt match shabby desperate money spent bring modern age maybe splash carpet holes bathroom smelt mold broken tiles luckily thanks review shower temperature didnt peel skin past yourself bedding clean am fine hunt hotel night sorry enterprise hotel splash cracking little hotel location food

Reviews.Title: “Good experience”
Reviews.Author: Doris M
Reviews.Content: daughter stayed hotel oct 718 2011 enjoyed staff initially booking double standard told twin beds double bed brought attention registration person able move twin beds fourth floor clean maintained day shower bit challenge comfortable temperature found hot hot add cold hot comfortable stay location hotel neighborhood restaurants grocery stores internet cafes post office food tube station etc vegetarian finding eat weather heat air conditioning extreme conditions bought meal grocery stores headed sight seeing ate found park

Reviews.Title: “Stay at your own risk!!”
Reviews.Author: caba4blue
Reviews.Content: hotel shocking location hotel run bad cant unpack bag cant evening shelf worst hotel stayed charges £160 night staff worse none care look guests please stay look hotel

Reviews.Title: “Worth the money for the location”
Reviews.Author: Lanz6051
Reviews.Content: tiny brief stay enterprise value due excellent location able walk attractions buckingham palace ben etc tube close despite comfortable appointed staff helpful booked airport transfer wakeup call requested

Reviews.Title: “irresponsible hotel”
Reviews.Author: Jean C
Reviews.Content: hotel expected expectations pretty low due previous reviews hotel actually pretty satisfied hotel realised bags bought gone missing hotel insisted responsible housekeeping cleaners allowed wardrobe trust hotel staff lowly act stealing items check luggage leaving hotel packed days stay placed cupboard realised bag gone missing stuff customs officer airport sight except hotel deposited luggage hotels reception 2 pounds dont responsible loss hotel claimed stay hotel tolerate bad service bad hotel rude staff act stealing

Reviews.Title: “Acceptable for the price”
Reviews.Author: ToreMarcus
Reviews.Content: location close subway makes dont look lobby restaurant posh regular run family hotel standard ok considering difficult nice affordable central hotels london ok dont intend spend time anyway wifi 2 pounds hour 2 pounds leave bags day safe

Reviews.Title: “Good budget accommodation”
Reviews.Author: JoeCooper
Reviews.Content: london popular dont expect accommodation cheap easy booked hotel budget spend money avoid hostel shared bathrooms bad neighbourhoods london list cities means tiny budget hong kong york fit list enterprise snug wasnt couldnt move fewer feet savvy traveller tell ok dont plan spending majority stay spent road museums restaurants etc decent hang hat refresh yourself ready days wanderings tv isnt huge channels didnt bathroom cosy space cant complain overall youd including window view surrounding wasnt enormous hotel location time visitors walk ideally located close victoria albert museum natural history museum notting hill challenge dont challenge train station hundred metres wherever london heathrow dollar complaints werent elevator moves speed smell expect wait stairs arent symmetrical design motionactivated lights switch whenever youre hopefully theres free breakfast thats shock free wifi time hotel isnt centre london thats affordable close ammenities definitely worth stay arent exciting arent disgrace id recommend budget luxuries share bathroom

Reviews.Title: “A hidden Gem”
Reviews.Author: drwfra
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel basically satisfied trip 4th floor main complaint water regulated shower shower curtain plexiglas partition requested shower live business city returned days time floor close elevator nice time enterprise hotel june 2011 specifically hotel convenient tube bus lines try restaurant restaurants earls court road staff friendly concern addressed advice avoid 4th floor costs

Reviews.Title: “Value for money and kind staff. Crummy room.”
Reviews.Author: WinderHall
Reviews.Content: stayed business couple weeks ago ive stayed earls court hotels couple offer value money reasonably central location facelift downstairs alas bedroom extremely pokey dated horrible bed noise coming street late night didnt single nights sleep five nights stayed enterprise hand staff friendly helpful price happily stay promise quality bed

Reviews.Title: “Great Value and location, a good choice”
Reviews.Author: vixx83
Reviews.Content: stayed nights impressed reviewers mentioned hotel fantastic location 5 mins walk earls court tube station loads fast food shops nearby hotel own restaurant didnt quick drink bar continental breakfast included package nice lots choose bread cheese ham cereals yoghurt fruit juice tea coffee fill start day staff happy friendly comfy nights sleep stay flash hotel represents excellent value money

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous location”
Reviews.Author: jennyg1965
Reviews.Content: location brilliant earls court station practically opposite street 2 minute walk 3 underground lines run station cupboard tea facilities fridge couldnt real milk hot considering winter cold outside left window whenever inevitably shut night noisy leave window ceiling fan left night bathroom tiny bathroom door hitting bed lift noisy voice announces hear inside hand key time didnt worry day staff polite overly friendly computer lobby expensive internet cafe road 50p half hour late breakfast reasonable variety didnt eat meal restaurant eat short walk earls court road

Reviews.Title: “I simply couldn't face another night at this hotel.”
Reviews.Author: CPerezBCN
Reviews.Content: main hotel 2 30am uk time travelling 11am spanish time tiny complained tiny window bed didnt close properly shove toilet paper gaps flies bed enclosed walls 3 reception complained lift paint coming walls hardly slept mattress terrible springs sticking lift kept awake morning heard banging looked outside renovating door mine hot spent hour discussing reception dragging suitcase simply cant staying hotel night

Reviews.Title: “Not worth the money”
Reviews.Author: Wanderous_007
Reviews.Content: trip abroad didnt time research hotel stick looks nice outside lobby furnished deception check story staff rude everytime key return key leaving unusual procedure honest hotel life wernt friendly didnt help luggage bad coming sightseeing evening found cleaned found blood stains sheets bed disgusting called report people front desk lightly send 15 min downstairs told 10min waiting guy change sheets didnt offer didnt bother apologize thinking dont fancy sleep advise hotel worth money close central attractions

Reviews.Title: “stay if your only purpose for hotel stay is for sleeping”
Reviews.Author: Shehwaz
Reviews.Content: checked reviews website expect mixed reviews location brilliant 2 mins earls court station tidy hotel staff cordial helpful food expensive alternatively restaurants spent 4 days visiting attractions hotel sleeping night

Reviews.Title: “most staff members very friendly!!”
Reviews.Author: Mariatoscana
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 4 nights june daughter whom visiting london found reception friendly helpful moved bigger greatly appreciated indian reception friendly dark haired lady front desk checked rude simply couldnt bothered regret stay otherwise return

Reviews.Title: “Friendly Staff - Great Location”
Reviews.Author: party310
Reviews.Content: friendly effecient staff help clean equiped restaurant located hotel perfect food reasonably priced central london location hotel pretty city def recommend

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly surprised”
Reviews.Author: m0nkey55
Reviews.Content: reading reviews hotel expecting worst pleasantly surprised wonderfully clean quiet excellent location admit bit wardrobe dresser double bed table planning spend time wouldnt notice downside light flickering lift arrived time evening fixed leads believe mend faults quickly
